content: i designed this head wrap to go with the slip it wristlet pattern by tracie hinds i didn t have enough yarn for a hat so i thought this head wrap would be enough to keep the ears warm and not mess with the hair thank you tracie hinds for the inspiration and thank you to all of the ravel-ers who share their patterns i hope to give back by sharing this one the pattern is very straightforward with a k2p2 rib and the slip it 4-row pattern in the middle
